long_description: Based on the popular Princeton Tec Quad headlamp, the Tactical Quad is designed to meet the specialized needs of outdoor users. Four LED bulbs operate in high, medium, low and flashing modes; suitable for use around a campsite or for signaling from a distance. LEDs output 60 lumens and throw a wide beam of light more than 35m on high. Colored interchangeable lens covers offer illumination for specific nighttime activities. Red lens helps preserve night vision while providing bright illumination. Green lens increases safety while hunting, making you more visible to other hunters. Single strap fits easily over caps and lets you read in comfort in your sleeping bag without a battery pack pressing against the back of your head. Single switch atop the headlamp is easily located and operated; pivoting headlamp lets you point the beam where you prefer. Features a low-battery indicator; LED bulbs last seemingly forever. Waterproof to 1m. Operates on three AAA batteries, included.
short_description: Based on the popular Princeton Tec Quad headlamp, the Tactical Quad is designed to meet the specialized needs of outdoor users.
